Topic.Title: I need help on "The Things that go Bump in the Night"

Posts.EditableText:
I'm stuck! I have opened cargo door and looked in the forklift in the nickel building, my inventory is the following:

You are carrying:
A Hand Radio, A Flashlight, An Electronic Key in your pocket, A small Fire Extinguisher tucked under your arm, a small container of soft Soap in your pocket, A roll of Gauze in your pocket, a small bottle of Asprin in your pocket, a large crescent Wrench and a remote Door Opener in your pocket.

Please help!

Posts.EditableText: There's a way to enter the forklift and go through a way you haven't gone before

Thanks in advance!
